import*as api from'../api';//Action creators
const getPosts=()=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await api.fetchPosts();dispatch({type:'FETCH_ALL',payload:data});}catch(error){console.log(error.message);}};export default getPosts;export const createPost=post=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await api.createPost(post);dispatch({type:'CREATE',payload:data});}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
